com.mygdx.pixelworld.data

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mygdx.pixelworld.data.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable

    public class World
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Class for managing map loading / world update and draw.
